title: These best-selling vegan leather boots are perfect for winter—and they're on sale
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle Canada is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

It’s almost time to say goodbye to flats and loafers and surrender to boot weather. Now’s the time of year when you start thinking about footwear that’s not only fashionable but will can brave the dropping temperatures and impending snowfall.

While the Chelsea boot reigns supreme during fall, it can be difficult to find a pair that can transition into winter. For those of us looking to keep winter wardrobe costs low, Amazon has some surprisingly stylish and top-rated footwear that we’re loving.

Case in point: the Brooklyn Vegan Leather Lined Twin Gore Boot. These stylish Chelsea boots feature a plush lining to keep feet warm and a lug rubber sole for added stability and traction no matter the weather.

Image via Amazon. More

SHOP IT: Amazon, $50 CAD (Originally $60 CAD) Plus: $5 Amazon coupon!





Available in both a classic black and trendy brown, these boots by DLG are the perfect alternative to some pricier options.

“They are so comfy and look awesome,” one Amazon customer wrote of the best-selling boot.

“I’m very happy with these boots so far,” a recent shopper added. “They fit well, are good quality and are warm enough for winter!”

For extra style and comfort this winter, we think these boots would look great with a thick wool sock.

Instead of hiding your socks this season, show off the white and red band of these Canadian made Duray socks.
